Class FlipFitCustomerDaoImpl

java.lang.Object
com.flipkart.dao.FlipFitCustomerDaoImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
FlipFitCustomerDAOInterface
public class FlipFitCustomerDaoImpl extends Object implements FlipFitCustomerDAOInterface
The `FlipFitCustomerDaoImpl` class implements the `FlipFitCustomerDAOInterface` to provide the data access layer for customer and user-related operations. It handles all database interactions for customer-specific data.

  • Method Details

    • createUser

      public int createUser(String username, String password, String email, String name, int roleId, String status) throws SQLException
      Creates a new user record in the database.
      Specified by:
      createUser in interface FlipFitCustomerDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      username - The username for the new user.
      password - The password for the new user.
      email - The email address of the user.
      name - The full name of the user.
      roleId - The unique ID of the role assigned to the user.
      status - The account status of the user.
      Returns:
      The generated `userId` of the newly created user.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • createCustomer

      public int createCustomer(int userId, String phone) throws SQLException
      Creates a new customer record in the database, linking it to an existing user.
      Specified by:
      createCustomer in interface FlipFitCustomerDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique ID of the user record to associate with the new customer.
      phone - The phone number of the customer.
      Returns:
      The generated `customerId` of the newly created customer.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • getCustomerByUser

      public Customer getCustomerByUser(User user) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a `Customer` object from the database using a `User` object.
      Specified by:
      getCustomerByUser in interface FlipFitCustomerDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      user - The `User` object containing generic user details.
      Returns:
      A `Customer` object if a corresponding record is found; otherwise, `null`.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • getCustomerByCredentials

      public Customer getCustomerByCredentials(String username, String password) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a `Customer` object from the database using a username and password.
      Specified by:
      getCustomerByCredentials in interface FlipFitCustomerDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the customer.
      password - The password of the customer.
      Returns:
      A `Customer` object if a matching record is found; otherwise, `null`.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • changePassword

      public boolean changePassword(String username, String oldPassword, String newPassword) throws SQLException
      Changes a user's password.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user.
      oldPassword - The current password of the user.
      newPassword - The new password to set.
      Returns:
      `true` if the password was successfully updated for one user; `false` otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
